scripts.dev-build: rm -rf dist && parcel build --no-optimize --no-cache testpreview.html && yarn private-dist-add-use-strict
scripts.dev-build-remotepreview: rm -rf dist && parcel build --no-optimize --no-cache testremotepreview.html && yarn private-dist-add-use-strict
scripts._build_remotepreview_app: rm -rf dist && parcel build --no-optimize --no-cache testremotepreview.html" && yarn private-dist-add-use-strict
scripts.private-dist-add-use-strict: bash -c 'for i in dist/*.js; do if [ -e "$i" ]; then mv "$i" "$i".COPY; echo "\"use strict\";" >"$i"; cat "$i".COPY >>"$i"; rm "$i".COPY; echo "added “use strict” to $i"; fi; done'
